name: The Legend of Bagger Vance
description: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddie.

review.author: matthewtessnear
review.heading: Better Movie Than Critics Say
review.reviewBody: Sports Illustrated once rated this the worst movie of all time. They're Crazy! Great story. Will Smith is excellent. Love the kid who plays the local Savannah boy! One of my favorite-if not my very favorite-golf movies.

keywords: golf,female removes her clothes,no music during opening credits,plus fours,barefoot male
